questions.question: What is the Fourier Transform used for?
options: Converting a signal from time domain to frequency domain
Converting a signal from frequency domain to time domain
questions.answer: Converting a signal from time domain to frequency domain

questions.question: Which of the following is a property of the Fourier Transform?
What is the Inverse Fourier Transform used for?
options: Converting a signal from frequency domain to time domain
Converting a signal from time domain to frequency domain
questions.answer: Converting a signal from frequency domain to time domain
